Landing.title: Welcome to MindLogger
Landing.reserchStudies: Participate in scientific research studies online!

Profile.title: Download MindLogger to get started.
Profile.description: Thank you for creating an account with MindLogger. Download MindLogger on an iOS or Android device to get started.

InvitationText.invitationAlreadyRemoved: Your invitation has already been removed.

InviteLink.title:
You have been invited to become a user of {{displayName}}.
To accept this invitation, click below:
InviteLink.description: After you have accepted the invitation, you will be able to access {{displayName}} in the free MindLogger app on your mobile device, if you follow three simple steps (see the user guide for greater detail):
InviteLink.step1: 1. Install the MindLogger app on your mobile device, if it isn’t already installed.
InviteLink.step2: Open the MindLogger app on your mobile device, and log in
InviteLink.step2_1: (if you have a MindLogger account) or sign up (if you are new to MindLogger). To sign up, tap “New User” on the login screen, and enter the email address where you received this email invitation.
InviteLink.step3: • Tap {{displayName}} on the MindLogger home screen and you are ready to go! If {{displayName}} does not appear, refresh the screen by sliding your finger downwards from the top, and a spinning wheel should appear while loading {{displayName}}.
InviteLink.footer: The Child Mind Institute is the creator of MindLogger, a platform for creating applets, but is not responsible for applet content created by outside parties.
InviteLink.reviewers: Users who can see your data for this applet:
InviteLink.managers: Users who can change this applet's settings, including who can access your data:
InviteLink.coordinators: Users who can change this applet's settings, but who cannot change who can see your data:
InviteLink.notFound: The invite link is either invalid or no long active.

additional.terms_text: I understand that the information provided by this questionnaire is not intended to replace the advice, diagnosis, or treatment offered by a medical or mental health professional, and that my anonymous responses may be used and shared for general research on children’s mental health.
additional.footer_text: CHILD MIND INSTITUTE, INC. AND CHILD MIND MEDICAL PRACTICE, PLLC (TOGETHER, “CMI”) DOES NOT DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY PRACTICE MEDICINE OR DISPENSE MEDICAL ADVICE AS PART OF THIS QUESTIONNAIRE. CMI ASSUMES NO LIABILITY FOR ANY DIAGNOSIS, TREATMENT, DECISION MADE, OR ACTION TAKEN IN RELIANCE UPON INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THIS QUESTIONNAIRE, AND ASSUMES NO RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR USE OF THIS QUESTIONNAIRE.
